Dry eyes and dry skin can be related, as both conditions are caused by a lack of moisture. Both conditions are also common side effects of certain medications and medical conditions, such as autoimmune disorders or hormonal imbalances.

Some possible solutions for dry eyes include:

* Using artificial tears or lubricating eye drops to add moisture to the eyes
* Using a humidifier to add moisture to the air
* Wearing sunglasses to protect the eyes from wind and sun
* Avoiding smoking and smoky environments
* Applying a warm compress to the eyes to help unblock oil-producing glands
* Taking omega-3 supplements
